segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a stupid plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sink is overflowing like she doesn't care!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere—on the floor, the cabinets, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, with her foot in the puddle; turn it off already!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are making it worse with their nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the wobbly stool—get down before you break something!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stealing cookies? In this disaster of a room?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is helping him, like it's a game—irresponsible!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole place could flood, and dishes might shatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't save this sloppy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to supervise these kids and that careless adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is infuriating; fix it before it's ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR
